message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $16,000. I believe it holds significant value that will benefit you greatly.
Alice, your offer is a bit high for my budget.  I'm interested in the product but I can only offer $8,000 at this time.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your offer, $16,000 is closer to its true value.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,000?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price.  However, $12,000 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm willing to go up to $9,500.  What do you think?
